results.title: Metformin coordinates osteoblast/osteoclast differentiation associated with ischemic osteonecrosis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ coordinates osteoblast/osteoclast differentiation associated with @<m>DISEASE_Osteonecrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@ischemic osteonecrosis@@@

results.title: Effects of metformin on the prevention of bisphosphonate-related osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions in rats.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the prevention of @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonate@@@-related @DISEASE_Jaw_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007571 @@@osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Of 457 adults (median age [interquartile range], 43 years [33-52 years]; 72% female), 142 (31%) were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Adjusted for age, sex, and Charlson Comorbidity Index, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users had significantly lower rate ratios of all-cause inpatient encounters (0.68; 95% confidence interval [CI], 0.52-0.88; P < .01), inpatient encounters with @DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@ codes (0.45; 95% CI, 0.30-0.66; P < .01), ED encounters with @DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@ codes (0.34; 95% CI, 0.21-0.54; P < .01), VOE (0.22; 95% CI, 0.12-0.41; P < .01), @DISEASE_Acute_Chest_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D056586 @@@ACS@@@ (0.17; 95% CI, 0.05-0.60; P = .01), and @<m>DISEASE_Osteonecrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@AVN@@@ (0.30; 95% CI, 0.11-0.87; P = .03).

citations.NLM: Badawy SM, Payne AB. Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus. Blood Adv. 2019 Nov 12;3(21):3297-3306. PMID: 31698459
citations.BibTeX: @article{31698459, title={Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus.}, author={Badawy SM and Payne AB}, journal={Blood Adv}, volume={3}, number={21}, pages={3297-3306}}
